bug.author: ilya-lavrenov
bug.summary: Increase time for some build steps
bug.description:
see <denchmark-link:http://pullrequest.opencv.org/buildbot/builders/2_4_noOCL_noSSE-win64-vc12-debug/builds/39>http://pullrequest.opencv.org/buildbot/builders/2_4_noOCL_noSSE-win64-vc12-debug/builds/39</denchmark-link>
Build failed due to time limit.

comments.comment: We've increased time limit from 5 min to 10 min, but mentioned tests still fail. I think it is better to add some intermediate console output to make sure these tests do not hang.
